message:
SYSTEM: FAIR_Semantics.pdf: Página 10
FAIR semantics
Preliminary Recommendations
10
P-Rec. 5: Semantic repositories should offer a common
API to access Semantic Artefacts and their content in 
various serializations for both use/reuse and indexation
by any search engines
§ Related FAIR principle: F4, A1, A1.1
§ Existing recommendations: OpenAPI, smartAPI, etc. 
§ Stakeholders: Repository
speaker: SYSTEM
